metadata.title: CVE-2017-16119 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Fresh is a module used by the Express.js framework for HTTP responsefreshness testing. It is vulnerable to a regular expression denial ofservice when it is passed specially crafted input to parse. This causes theevent loop to be blocked causing a denial of service condition.

criterions.comment: node-fresh package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
